overview: The Road Show - In this classic program, five favourite Play School presenters sing songs, tell stories and play games about cars, buses and bikes – and about how to be safe on the road. Whether it's simply crossing the road, riding a bike or taking the dog for a walk, the Play School presenters have a fun way to show us how to do it safely. Songs include: The Wheels on the Bus, Let’s Go Walking, Take You Riding and Zoom.
title: Play School - The Road Show
